actionConfiguration.body:
select channel_display_name AS channel,
(case EXTRACT(month FROM date_trunc('month',date)) when '1' THEN 'Jan'
				when '2' THEN 'Feb'
				when '3' THEN 'Mar'
				when '4' THEN 'Apr'
				when '5' THEN 'May'
				when '6' THEN 'June'
				when '7' THEN 'July'
				when '8' THEN 'Aug'
				when '9' THEN 'Sept'
				when '10' THEN 'Oct'
				when '11' THEN 'Nov'
				when '12' THEN 'Dec'
				END) as Month,
SUM(views) as Views,
SUM(watch_time_hours) as Watch_Hrs,
SUM(estimated_youtube_ad_revenue) as Revenue
FROM public.smg_dmp_youtube_dashboard_unq_view
where date > '{{Start_date.selectedDate}}':: date
  AND date <= '{{End_date.selectedDate}}':: date
			AND channel_display_name like {{Channel_select.selectedOptionValue ? Channel_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}} 
	AND category like {{Category_select.selectedOptionValue ? Category_select.selectedOptionValue : "%"}}
group by date_trunc('month',date),channel
order by Views DESC
